name: 16oz Hand Whipped Shea Butter
description:
Raw Organic Shea Butter can help heal rough dry skin and hair
Hair quickly absorbs shea butter, restoring moisture and elasticity

Our recipe includes simple ingredients 
Virgin Organic Coconut oil and a blend of one or 
more essential oils for added benefit.

name: 16oz Hand Whipped Cocoa Butter
description:
100% Pure raw cocoa butter immediately impacts the texture of the skin, making it feel more supple and soft  

Because it can penetrate the skin layers so deeply, its effective use in eczema and dermatitis treatment offers the added benefit of not having to continually re-apply the cocoa butter  cream more than a couple of times daily

name: 8oz 100% Raw African Black Soap All-In-On (face-body-shampoo-baby wash)
description:
Black soap contains water and the bark of the shea butter tree, the leaves of palm trees, the bark and leaves of the banana tree bark and leaves, plantain plant and the pods of the coco plant. The soap also contains a number of oils including shea butter, coconut oil, palm oil and kernel oil.   

It has been know to cure acne and removes blemishes and others think it heals dry and cracked skin

Our soap comes in liquid form to last longer than non- liquid form and is blended with essential oils for added benefit.
